game

Class Limbs

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Limbs

  • public class Limbs
extends java.lang.Object
    A Collection of Limb objects. A Limbs represents a collection of Limb objects that a particular Actor may have. Provides methods to check how many limbs there are, adding a limb, removing a limb and getting a copy of the collection of limbs.
    Author:
    Isaac Lee Kian Min
